p: Similarly, Liang et al. [ 316] employed castor oil, as a natural antimicrobial agent, and MDEA, as an ionic chain extender, to synthesize waterborne PUs. Samples were tested against L. monocytogenes and V. parahaemolyticus bacteria, being more effective by increasing either the MDEA content or the reduction of polyol functionality (a lower crosslinking density, higher mobility, and better interaction with bacteria).
